title: Dynamic Destination Connector Support
description: Introduced dynamic destination connector support to RAG pipeline.

changes.text: Supports Pinecone, Milvus, Qdrant, MongoDB, Postgres

title: Image Source Connector Support
description: Introduced image source connector support to RAG any type of image files.

changes.text: Supports Local image files, Any image url

title: Audio Source Connector Support
description: Introduced audio source connector support to RAG any type of audio files.

changes.text: Supports Local audio files, Any audio url

title: Video Source Connector Support
description: Introduced video source connector support to RAG any type of video files.

changes.text: Supports Local video files, Youtube Video, Any video url

title: Migrated v1 apis to v2 apis
description: Migrated v1 apis to v2 apis

changes.text: Migrated v1 apis to v2 apis

title: Google Drive Source connector Support
description: Introduced google drive support for dynamic RAG-as-a-Service.

title: Google Sheets Source connector Support with BullMQ
description: Introduced google sheets support for dynamic RAG-as-a-Service.

title: Web Scraping Source connector Support
description: Introduced web scraping support for dynamic RAG-as-a-Service.

title: Hypothetical Question Support
description: Introduced hypothetical question support for dynamic RAG-as-a-Service.

changes.text: Hypothetical questions generation with chunking to improve similarity search

title: Introduced PDF Chunking by batch processing
description: Improved PDF chunking by batch processing

changes.text: Improved PDF chunking by batch processing

title: MCP support
description: Introduced Knowledgebase wise MCP support for dynamic RAG-as-a-Service.

changes.text: Knowledgebase wise MCP support for dynamic RAG-as-a-Service

title: Pipeline Supports
description: Introduced knowledgebase wise pipeline supports for dynamic RAG-as-a-Service.

changes.text: Knowledgebase wise pipeline supports for dynamic RAG-as-a-Service

title: Dynamic Embeding Model support
description: Added support for dynamic embedding models includes OpenAI, Gemini

title: Knowledge Base
description: implement knowledgebase feature for dynamic RAG-as-a-Service

changes.text: Introduced a new knowledgebase feature allowing users to create isolated knowledgebases with configurable pipelines.
Implemented CRUD operations for knowledgebases, including validation and error handling.
Enhanced the API with new endpoints for managing knowledgebases, including activation, deactivation, and searching

title: IngestIQ Launch
description: The first release of IngestIQ. Unified RAG infrastructure for everyone.
